name: Foreign Space
description:
Explore alien planets for resources and build spaceships.

Features:

  • Randomly generated planets.
  • Resource gathering.
  • Ship building!
  • Flying trough space.
  • Resource gathering, but with ships.

Controls:

  • A/D to move.
  • Space to jump, you can also double jump.
  • Scroll to choose items from hotbar.
  • Left click to place or destroy blocks.
  • Right click to place or destroy background blocks.
  • Create a platform consisting of at least four Platform blocks and a Ship Constructor to begin shipbuilding!

Known Issues:

  • The game world doesn't get saved, if you close the game you will lose progress!
  • Ships do not get saved. If you'll walk too far away from one, you're going to lose it.
  • The inventory has upgrade and armor slots that don't really do anything.
  • Exiting a menu by clicking while holding a block will place it down.
